title: Dashboard
description: This is a dashboard you can freely customize by changing background, adding links,  writing down notes etc.

title: AI Image Generator
description: A simple image generator that uses the OpenAI API to create four different images based on your prompt.

title: Quire
description: Group project. A notes application with qualities such as text formatting, image uploading and more.

title: Kanban Board
description: Group project. We built a kanban board with drag and drop functionality that is also customizable.
